alert.note: Alert for Renville (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 5:29PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN BOTTINEAU AND NORTHWESTERN RENVILLE COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM CDT... At 528 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles north of Westhope to 7 miles east of Sherwood to 9 miles northwest of Greene. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mohall, Westhope, Sherwood, Greene, Antler, Tolley, Landa, Loraine, and Roth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
